snippet.title: NEW NES!! BLAZING RANGERS English Trailer
snippet.description:
Blazing Rangers, a new NES game by First Press Games!
Testing the limits of mapper 0 while maintaining the feeling of the ‘80s!

Visit our web store for more details or to pre-order the full game:
https://firstpressgames.com/collections/blazing-rangers

Try the free demo ROM from Itchio:
https://firstpressgames.itch.io/blazing-rangers

Blazing Rangers was created by the following Japan-based team:
・Game developed by Karu_gamo
・Music composed by Hydden
・Main Theme song "Moeru hikeshi tamashii! Honoo no ranger man” (Lyrics: Karu_gamo) sung by bud x dies! (Ousuke/Masashi Yukita)
・Manga for the instruction manual drawn by Juugo Shimotsuki

Blazing Rangers is an original one-screen action game, compatible with NES, reviving the golden era of arcade games in the 1980s. The feeling when playing this game on an old CRT TV is truly memorable, even more so when enjoying it in 2-player mode while helping each other!
